title: Michael Moore
description:
Michael Moore explains why he thinks there’s still a slim chance the senate could convict Trump and talks about his new podcast. Plus, he discusses the 2020 election, the New York Times’ endorsement of Amy Klobuchar and Elizabeth Warren, and Senator Bernie Sanders' fight against climate change.

He also takes a few more questions backstage just for this podcast.
